backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Veil app implementing user registration, post creation/editing/deletion, reactions, invite codes, and admin/access-control logic using mixins and helper modules.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component, page, hook, and utility in the frontend/src directory.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color values for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Veil React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TSX entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for login, signup, dashboard, post creation, my posts, community feed, and admin, all wrapped in a Layout with a Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard component with tabbed navigation for managing public posts, members, invite codes, and post history, with a back button to the main dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AdminInviteCodes: Admin panel tab for managing invite codes, supporting adding custom codes, generating random codes, copying, and revoking existing codes with active/used separation.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublicPosts: Admin panel tab displaying all public posts sorted by date with post metadata and a delete confirmation dialog for content moderation.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserManagem: Admin panel component for listing all users with options to suspend/unsuspend them and update their subscription status, with expandable rows per user.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserPostHis: Admin component that allows looking up a user's posts by Principal ID and deleting individual posts with a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/EmotionBadge.tsx: Small presentational component that renders a styled badge for a given EmotionType (confess, broke, happy) with optional size variants.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright year and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with logo, nav links (My Posts, Community, Admin), user pseudonym display, and a sign-out button.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper layout component that composes Header, main content area, and Footer into a full-page flex column.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Card component for a user's own post supporting inline editing, deletion, and toggling public/private visibility based on subscription status.
frontend/src/components/PublicPostCard.t: Card component for displaying a public community post with support/care/strength reaction buttons, preventing reactions on the user's own posts.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionBann: Informational banner shown when a user's grace period has ended, displaying region-specific renewal pricing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated identities, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, including queries and mutations for user profiles, registration, subscription status, and posts.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes including emotion and subscription status color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin-only page that redirects unauthenticated users to login and non-admins see an access-restricted message, otherwise renders the AdminDashboard component.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityFeedPage.tsx: Displays a chronologically sorted feed of public posts, redirecting unauthenticated or unregistered users, with loading skeletons and an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page showing emotion selection buttons (Confess, Broke, Happy) for creating posts, with subscription status display and gating based on the user's subscription.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the Veil login page with Internet Identity authentication, redirecting authenticated users to home or signup based on whether they have an existing profile.
frontend/src/pages/MyPostsPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's posts sorted newest-first, with loading skeletons and an empty state, redirecting unauthenticated or unregistered users.
frontend/src/pages/PostCreationPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating a new post with a given emotion type, enforcing minimum word counts for certain emotions and checking subscription status before submission.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Handles new user registration by collecting an invite code, pseudonym, and region, then calling the register mutation and navigating to home on success.
frontend/src/utils/subscriptionHelpers.t: Exports helper functions to check post creation/public visibility permissions and format subscription status labels and regional pricing based on SubscriptionStatus and Region.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routing, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/src/utils/wordCounter.ts: Exports a word-counting function, a minimum-word-count checker, and the constant MIN_WORDS_CONFESS_HAPPY (24) used to validate post content length.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, serif/sans font families, extended border radii, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata for Veil: a private invite-only emotional sharing platform with pseudonymous users, subscription model, and three emotion post types, along with architectural constraints and a registry of completed features.
